other_tests.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis is mild in the visualized lung bases. No pleural effusion. Sizeable hiatal hernia with food content in the sac. Interval decrease of previous CBD dilatation. 12-mm partly exophytic left lower pole renal cyst noted. No free air, fluid or lymphadenopathy in the abdomen.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interval decrease of previous CBD dilatation.

other_tests.findings: Intermediate attenuating fluid collection with rim enhancement in the pre-sacral area, measuring 20 x 82 mm, compatible with an abscess. Suture line noted in the rectal vault post-sigmoid colectomy. Tiny pocket of mixed gas and fluid seen underneath the incision site, non-specific, could represent resolving hematoma or tiny abscess.
